title: Fast
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||[[Movement delay]] -2||You cover ground quickly.
|-
|2||[[Movement delay]] -3||You cover ground very quickly.
|-
|3||[[Movement delay]] -4||You cover ground extremely quickly.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
Only occurs as a starting mutation, i.e. does not occur randomly.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
'''Species notes:''' [[Spriggan]]s start at rank 3.
